2097470.name: The Land of Babel
2097470.description: Inspired by beloved city-building games such as Dwarf Fortress, Rim World and Civilization, Land of Babel lets you create, shape and govern a great civilization and watch as the infrastructure, production and even the culture of the world evolves over time. With full modding tools and flexibility, the possibilities to create and explore an unparalleled fantasy landscape are literally endless. Forge your world, conquer it, and watch it break - the future is yours to decide in Land of Babel!"
